translation.textChatsTab: Navigate to profile tab to logout.

config.noResultsHouseBlock: No house blocks in selected brigade

comments.emptyMessage: Leave a comment and start the conversation
comments.title: Comments
comments.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this comment? This action cannot be undone.

chat.deleteDraftMessage: Are you sure you want to discard this draft? This action cannot be undone.
chat.deletePosttMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this blog? This action cannot be undone.

deleteAccount.title: Delete account
deleteAccount.description: Are you sure you want to delete this account? This action has many side effects and cannot be reversed.

error.email: Please enter a valid email address
error.empty: Please enter your email and password
error.noInternet: Internet connection is required to log in.
error.suggestFirstLastName: Invalid credentials. Try with your first and last name as username. Example: juanperez
error.suggestFirstLastNameYear: Invalid credentials. Try with your first name, last name and year of birth as username. Example: juanperez1990
error.suggestFirstLastNameYearMonth: Invalid credentials. Try with your first name, last name, year and month of birth as username. Example: juanperez199004

register.title: Create Account
register.passwordHelperText: Write a lowercase password that is at least 6 characters long and easy to remember.

error.suggestFirstLastName: The user '{{field}}' is already in use. Try with using your first and last name. Example: juanperez
error.suggestFirstLastNameYear: The user '{{field}}' is already in use. Try with using your first name, last name and year of birth. Example: juanperez1990
error.suggestFirstLastNameYearMonth: The user '{{field}}' is already in use. Try with using your first name, last name, year and month of birth. Example: juanperez199004

registerSuccess.successDescription: Your account is being verified and will be active in the next few days.

validation.passwordLength: Password must be at least {{length}} characters
validation.usernameLength: Username must be at least {{length}} characters
validation.contentPostLengthMin: The blog text cannot be empty

list.pending: You have {{storedVisits}} pending visits to be synchronized.

newHouse.title: Register new site
newHouse.siteTypeQuestion: What type of site is it?
newHouse.noMapConnection: We cannot load the map because you have no internet connection.
newHouse.confirmSiteNumberDescription: Confirm with your brigade facilitator that the site you are about to visit corresponds to site code {{code}}

validation.siteCodeRegexError: Field must only contain upper case letters and numbers

summary.title: Summary of the visit
summary.description: Status of the site as of today

containerPicture.title: Container photo
containerPicture.description: Take a photo of the container and register it

offline.greetings: The data from your visit has been saved on your device.

online.greetings: The visit data has been saved.

tarikiStatusModal.title: New Tariki site!
tarikiStatusModal.subtitle: This is now a Tariki site
tarikiStatusModal.description: {{brigadistPoints}} points were assigned to you and {{brigadePoints}} points to your brigade. Excelent work!

messages.chat: To see chat messages, you need to join a brigade. Talk to a facilitator to join one.
messages.visit: To start recording visits, you need to join a brigade. Talk to a facilitator to join one.
messages.profile: To see more information, you need to join a brigade. Talk to a facilitator to join one.

errorCodes.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errorCodes.48: The user '{{field}}' is already in use
errorCodes.49: The phone '{{field}}' is already in use
errorCodes.50: The email '{{field}}' is already in use
errorCodes.55: The account was temporarily locked. Multiple failed login attempts occurred. Try again later.
errorCodes.mustUpdateAppDescription: You must update the application to continue using DengueChatPlus.
